Text: 378 MB? are you kidding me? i saw better updaters than these and they are only 60-70 KB
This application is not an updater. It is an archive of the original binary releases from Mojang.
Also, I fixed the world backup and restore functions with this version. It will now automatically carry over your worlds when you install a different version.
Wow, this is amazing! Will seed for longer than usual.

Thanks for this. I own Minecraft but they make it so hard to get older versions of the game.  I would like to try out some of the really old versions.  I started Minecraft in Beta 1.2.  I haven't finished downloading yet but I hope I can get the jars out of the program and have separate installations per version.  Yes I am a Minecraft addict.
